name: Factea Group
overview:
Since 2004, the Factea Group network has carried out over a thousand successful purchasing projects, helping organizations - large and small, private and public, for-profit and non-profit.

Factea Group has experienced strong growth since its creation, specializing in specific purchasing families with Factea Printing, Factea Fleet, Factea Building,… or in specific topics with Factea Sourcing, Factea Durable (sustainable),… Today Factea Group provides an opportunity for entrepreneurs to join its network by creating their own purchasing consultancy franchise.

Why choose Factea Group?

When evaluating any business venture, whether creating a start-up company or buying into a proven franchise model such as Facteaâ€™s, one of the first questions you should be asking yourself is â€œwhat is the true market potential ?â€

That may sound like a basic component of due diligence, but quite often the promise and excitement of starting something new gets in the way of this fundamental consideration. The reality is, many seemingly great business ideas fail because of limited demand and fierce competition. Becoming part of the Factea network will bring you the power of notoriety and the support of a global network to transform your sales skills into turnover.

Discover the freedom of owning a business by joining the Factea Group network. You can build a franchise in a specific topic (Telecom, Chemicals, Travels, Training, Insuranceâ€¦) which allows you to take part in this great business opportunity.
